name: Oh, the Mumanity!
description:
** NOTE: Game was made in 48 hours for the Stay Safe! Jam **

We have a global pandemic on our paws. No immunity, no cures, no time to waste!

The boss called you and Dave, you two have to hold down the fort at McWhisker's yourselves -- you're in this together, bask in the solidarity as you fulfill the essential job of providing mumans who are breaking quarantine with coffee and cheezburgers!

Be careful though, surfaces can get infected, use your bottle of super high volume spray disinfectant to clean things constantly and WASH YOUR DAMN DIRTY PAWS!

Controls

WASD - move

Left shift - run

C - Clean with spray disinfectant

E - Interact in direction you were last traveling

Buttons around Dave direct him to do various tasks.

The sink can remove infection after being filled up (note: infection starts to slowly deplete HP, but speeds up exponentially!).

To get an order started, interact with the register.

To turn in an order, interact with the pickup counter.
